survey_brief: This survey aims to assess employee participation and satisfaction with the current corporate wellness programs offered by the company.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you participate in the company's wellness programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure the options cover all possible frequencies.

script.question_text: How frequently do you participate in the company's wellness programs?

questions.question_text: Which wellness programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents except those who selected 'Never' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select. Include 'None of the above' to capture non-participation.

script.question_text: Which wellness programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears for all respondents except those who selected 'Never' in Q1

questions.question_text: What motivates you to participate in wellness programs?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected any option other than 'Never' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional input.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: SINGLE_CHOICE with an optional open-text follow-up for 'Other'

script.question_text: What motivates you to participate in wellness programs?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected any option other than 'Never' in Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current wellness programs offered by the company?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected any option other than 'Never' in Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale for satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the current wellness programs offered by the company?
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who selected any option other than 'Never' in Q1

questions.question_text: What additional wellness programs would you like to see offered?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Ensure the text box is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: What additional wellness programs would you like to see offered?
